name: cleanlounge
author: farblood
title: CleanLounge
description: Very nice looking dark/light theme for CSGOLounge and DOTA2Lounge.

ld-background-image.description: If selected, CSGOLounge and DOTA2Lounge will have background images.

ld-item-price-show.description: If selected, your item price (the one, that CSGL provides) will be shown only on hover.
